1.2.name: wordpress/add-twitter-rss
1.2.description:
Add Twitter RSS is a simple plugin that adds your Twitter RSS link to the header of your blog. It allows your readers to easily find your Twitter feed.

Changelog: Version 2.2: Added utility to retrieve Twitter ID from Twitter Screen Name. Version 1.1: Added option to display a "Twitter RSS" link in the Meta widget in your sidebar.
